product_name: CamelBak Aurora Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: With room for the basics and enough water for rides lasting around 2 hrs., the women's low-profile CamelBak Aurora(TM) Hydration Pack keeps you hydrated during weekend outings and short tours. Lightweight design holds the 70 fl. oz. (2 liter) Antidote(TM) reservoir with a wide mouth cap for easy filling; quick-snap reservoir cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Holds up to 183 cu. in. of gear; plenty of space for a multitool, spare tube, tire levers, energy bars, keys and your wallet. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, ensuring no leakage during transport. Stretch elastic side panels provide overflow storage for pump, extra tubes and jacket. CamelBak Aurora Hydration Pack has reflective detailing that increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: With room for the basics and enough water for rides lasting around 2 hrs., the women's low-profile CamelBak Aurora(TM) Hydration Pack keeps you hydrated during weekend outings and short tours.
